quotes.quote: Being slagged off is good for you. It thickens the skin and strengthens the backbone.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: One of life's sorest tragedies is that the people who brim with confidence are always the wrong people.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: Who do hats think they are? They contribute nothing to society, and don't even display basic manners. Has a hat ever held a door open for you? No. It hasn't.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: If you truly believe you need to pick a mobile phone that 'says something' about your personality, don't bother. You don't have a personality. A mental illness, maybe - but not a personality.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: Society? Can we trust us? Doubt it. We're probably not even real, as was revealed in the popular documentary The Matrix.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: Cupcakes are for people who can’t handle reality.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: What I hear when I'm being yelled at is people caring really loudly at me.
quotes.author: Lesley Knope

quotes.quote: One person's annoying is another's inspiring and heroic.
quotes.author: Lesley Knope

quotes.quote: There is nothing we can't do if we work hard, never sleep, and shirk all other responsibilities in our lives.
quotes.author: Lesley Knope

quotes.quote: There is nothing we can't do if we work hard, never sleep, and shirk all other responsibilities in our lives.
quotes.author: Lesley Knope

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Eddison

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: You can’t wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Never put off until tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Try to be like the turtle – at ease in your own shell.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.quote: Follow your passion, stay true to yourself, never follow someone else’s path unless you’re in the woods and you’re lost and you see a path then by all means you should follow that.
quotes.author: Ellen Degeneres

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
quotes.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

quotes.quote: If you’re going to be able to look back on something and laugh about it, you might as well laugh about it now.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: Life is like photography. You need the negatives to develop.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you end up with a boring, miserable life because you listened to your mom, your dad, your teacher, your priest, or some guy on television telling you how to do your shit, then you deserve it.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: If you don’t design your own life plan, chances are you’ll fall into someone else’s plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Accept who you are, unless you are a serial killer.
quotes.author: Ellen Degeneres

quotes.quote: I have a simple philosophy: Fill what’s empty. Empty what’s full. Scratch where it itches.
quotes.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.quote: Life is a shipwreck but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Good things come to those who wait… greater things come to those who get off their ass and do anything to make it happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t worry about the world coming to an end today. It’s already tomorrow in Australia.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Edison failed 10, 000 times before he made the electric light. Do not be discouraged if you fail a few times.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Here is a test to find whether your mission on earth is finished: If you’re alive it isn’t.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I’ll probably never fully become what I wanted to be when I grew up, but that’s probably because I wanted to be a ninja princess.
quotes.author: Cassandra Duffy

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Whoever said, ‘It’s not whether you win or lose that counts,’ probably lost.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: If you fall, I’ll always be there.
quotes.author: The Floor

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If not us, who? If not now, when?
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
